ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wyld Stallyns are back, and this time they’re travelling across the whole universe!
Bill and Ted have been kidnapped by a bodacious alien and are handed over to…their long-lost family?!
Brian Joines and Bachan (Bill & Ted Go to Hell) team up once more for an all-new Bill & Ted adventure.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-22 07:59:05. [CVDB603175]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/bill-and-ted-save-the-universe-1/4000-603175/
